content.content: Recognized Delegate Compensation - January 2023  Important Note This is the fourth month using the 120-day rolling window for calculating delegation metrics as per the recently ratified MIP4c2-SP24. The figures displayed on the voting portal also reflect this change. It is the first month weighting participation for executive votes by a factor of 5 when calculating compensation, as per the ratified MIP4c2-SP29  Breakdown - January 2023     Delegate Payment Address Amount (DAI) Notes     Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC 0x688d508f3a6B0a377e266405A1583B3316f9A2B3 12,000    Coldiron.eth 0x6634e3555DBF4B149c5AEC99D579A2469015AEca 12,000    GFX Labs 0xa6e8772af29b29B9202a073f8E36f447689BEef6 11,653    Flipside Crypto 0x1ef753934C40a72a60EaB12A68B6f8854439AA78 11,407    mhonkasalo & teemulau 0x97Fb39171ACd7C82c439b6158EA2F71D26ba383d 11,064 Performance Modifier of 96.64% applied   Feedblack Loops LLC 0x80882f2A36d49fC46C3c654F7f9cB9a2Bf0423e1 10,807    Penn Blockchain 0x2165d41af0d8d5034b9c266597c1a415fa0253bd 10,738    JustinCase 0xE070c2dCfcf6C6409202A8a210f71D51dbAe9473 9,588    Stablenode 0x3B91eBDfBC4B78d778f62632a4004804AC5d2DB0 9,496    London Business School 0xB83b3e9C8E3393889Afb272D354A7a3Bd1Fbcf5C 3,797    Frontier Research LLC 0xA2d55b89654079987CF3985aEff5A7Bd44DA15A8 2,419    [email protected] 0xdC1F98682F4F8a5c6d54F345F448437b83f5E432 1,656 Performance Modifier of 41.52% applied   Chris Blec 0xa3f0AbB4Ba74512b5a736C5759446e9B50FDA170 1,001    CodeKnight 0x46dFcBc2aFD5DD8789Ef0737fEdb03489D33c428 939    ONESTONE 0x4eFb12d515801eCfa3Be456B5F348D3CD68f9E8a 352    HKUST EPI Blockchain TBD 348    ConsenSys 0xE78658A8acfE982Fde841abb008e57e6545e38b3 96    pvl 0x6ebB1A9031177208A4CA50164206BF2Fa5ff7416 35 Performance Modifier of 53.84% applied    ACREinvest, CalBlockchain, monetsupply, Jason Yanowitz, and ChicagoDAO did not qualify for compensation this month based on their metrics. Gauntlet and RiskDAO do not currently have any MKR delegated to their active platform. Overall Compensation for January 2023: 109,396 DAI Summary - Calculations - Processed MKR-by-Day - Raw MKR-by-Day   Payout for December 2022: 108,690 DAI  Payout for November 2022: 103,230 DAI  3-month Annualized Compensation: 1,285,264 DAI   Credits Huge thanks to @piotr.klis from the Data Insights CU for fetching the raw data, updating the feed to account for delegate contract migration, and generally putting up with GovAlpha’s neediness.  Comments  Accommodation for Recognized Delegate Contract Migration Per MIP61c4 when Recognized Delegates are involved in a contract migration there is a 30-day window where the amount of MKR delegated to their old and new contract is counted for the purposes of compensation in order to provide stability for Recognized Delegates.  Calculations around starting / leaving delegates  Recognized Delegates’ MKR weight is measured once per day, and this is used to generate an average for the month. The amount of MKR Recognized Delegates are credited with for compensation calculations is an average of the days for which they were active for the month. The average referenced in the previous point counts MKR delegated on each day to a maximum of 10,000 MKR in line with the intention to cap the benefit from delegated MKR at the upper threshold of 10,000 MKR. We apply pro-rata scaling to compensation for Recognized Delegates that were only active for a part of the month.   Recognized Delegate Compensation Calculations MIP 61 was ratified during the March 2022 Governance Cycle. This MIP contains details of the calculations used to determine Recognized Delegate compensation as well as information about the Performance Modifier. MIP4c2-SP24 passed in the September Governance Cycle. This has amended MIP61 to use a 120-day rolling window for calculation of delegation metrics. MIP4c2-SP29 passed in the January Governance Cycle. This introduces an Abstain Modifier and modifies weighting for Executive Votes by a factor of 5.  Distribution Recognized Delegate compensation will be distributed as part of the next Executive Vote, scheduled for 2023-02-08.  Previous Recognized Delegate Compensation Breakdowns  December 2022 November 2022 October 2022 September 2022 August 2022 July 2022 June 2022 May 2022 April 2022 March 2022 February 2022 January 2022 December 2021 November 2021   cc: @Recognized-Delegates
content.GPT-summary: The post provides a breakdown of the recognized delegate compensation for January 2023, including the payment address, amount, and notes. The post also explains the calculations and process for determining recognized delegate compensation, as well as the amendments made to the MIPs governing the process. The post is not asking for feedback, advertising the proposal, or extending the proposal.

content.content: Please use this address instead for flipsidecrypto: 0x1ef753934C40a72a60EaB12A68B6f8854439AA78 It was used the last months already, but asking @fig to confirm just in case
Good spot, I had it right in the exec sheet but copied it wrong here - fixing now

We have not received a payment address for @HKUST_EPI_BLOCKCHAIN. As we have had to finalize payment details for PE to write the code, it will not be possible to include their payment in the forthcoming executive vote. It will be included in a future executive vote as the schedule allows. See MIP61c3 for further details.

content.content: Ah thanks for the heads up, apologies our team was away during the Lunar New Year celebrations. Please allow the assets to be transferred to our gnosis safe wallet: 0xE4594A66d9507fFc0d4335CC240BD61C1173E666 Cheers!

Recognized Delegate Compensation - February 2023  Important Note This is the fifth month using the 120-day rolling window for calculating delegation metrics as per the recently ratified MIP4c2-SP24. The figures displayed on the voting portal also reflect this change. It is the second month weighting participation for executive votes by a factor of 5 when calculating compensation, as per the ratified MIP4c2-SP29  Breakdown - February 2023     Delegate Payment Address Amount (DAI) Notes     Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC 0x688d508f3a6B0a377e266405A1583B3316f9A2B3 12,000    Coldiron.eth 0x6634e3555DBF4B149c5AEC99D579A2469015AEca 12,000    GFX Labs 0xa6e8772af29b29B9202a073f8E36f447689BEef6 12,000    mhonkasalo & teemulau 0x97Fb39171ACd7C82c439b6158EA2F71D26ba383d 11,447    Penn Blockchain 0x2165d41af0d8d5034b9c266597c1a415fa0253bd 11,178    Feedblack Loops LLC 0x80882f2A36d49fC46C3c654F7f9cB9a2Bf0423e1 10,802    Flipside Crypto 0x1ef753934C40a72a60EaB12A68B6f8854439AA78 10,347 Involved in delegate contract migration   JustinCase 0xE070c2dCfcf6C6409202A8a210f71D51dbAe9473 8,680    StableLab 0x3B91eBDfBC4B78d778f62632a4004804AC5d2DB0 3,961 Involved in delegate contract migration   London Business School 0xB83b3e9C8E3393889Afb272D354A7a3Bd1Fbcf5C 3,126 Performance Modifier of 82.36% applied   Frontier Research LLC 0xA2d55b89654079987CF3985aEff5A7Bd44DA15A8 2,455    Chris Blec 0xa3f0AbB4Ba74512b5a736C5759446e9B50FDA170 951    CodeKnight 0xf6006d4cF95d6CB2CD1E24AC215D5BF3bca81e7D 939    ONESTONE 0x4eFb12d515801eCfa3Be456B5F348D3CD68f9E8a 360    ConsenSys 0xE78658A8acfE982Fde841abb008e57e6545e38b3 181     ACREinvest, CalBlockchain, HKUST EPI Blockchain, [email protected], pvl, Jason Yanowitz, and ChicagoDAO did not qualify for compensation this month based on their metrics. Gauntlet and RiskDAO do not currently have any MKR delegated to their active platform. Overall Compensation for January 2023: 100,427 DAI Summary - Calculations - Processed MKR-by-Day - Raw MKR-by-Day   Payout for January 2023: 109,396 DAI  Payout for December 2022: 108,690 DAI  3-month Annualized Compensation: 1,274,052 DAI   Note This month we will also include the January payment for HKUST EPI Blockchain that was not paid out last month due to no address being available - this payment will be 348 DAI and will be paid to 0xE4594A66d9507fFc0d4335CC240BD61C1173E666.  Credits Huge thanks to @piotr.klis from the Data Insights CU for fetching the raw data, updating the feed to account for delegate contract migration, and generally putting up with GovAlpha’s neediness.  Comments  Accommodation for Recognized Delegate Contract Migration Per MIP61c4 when Recognized Delegates are involved in a contract migration there is a 30-day window where the amount of MKR delegated to their old and new contract is counted for the purposes of compensation in order to provide stability for Recognized Delegates.  Calculations around starting / leaving delegates  Recognized Delegates’ MKR weight is measured once per day, and this is used to generate an average for the month. The amount of MKR Recognized Delegates are credited with for compensation calculations is an average of the days for which they were active for the month. The average referenced in the previous point counts MKR delegated on each day to a maximum of 10,000 MKR in line with the intention to cap the benefit from delegated MKR at the upper threshold of 10,000 MKR. We apply pro-rata scaling to compensation for Recognized Delegates that were only active for a part of the month.   Recognized Delegate Compensation Calculations MIP 61 was ratified during the March 2022 Governance Cycle. This MIP contains details of the calculations used to determine Recognized Delegate compensation as well as information about the Performance Modifier. MIP4c2-SP24 passed in the September Governance Cycle. This has amended MIP61 to use a 120-day rolling window for calculation of delegation metrics. MIP4c2-SP29 passed in the January Governance Cycle. This introduces an Abstain Modifier and modifies weighting for Executive Votes by a factor of 5.  Distribution Recognized Delegate compensation will be distributed as part of the next Executive Vote, scheduled for 2023-03-08.
